import { Card, CardHeader, CardTitle, CardBody, CardText } from 'reactstrap' const BlockquoteStyling = () => { return ( Blockquotes styling Add a .border-[left / right]-[color] .border-[left / right]-3{' '} helper classes, where color can be any color from Vuexy Admin color palette.
Sometimes when you innovate, you make mistakes. It is best to admit them quickly, and get on with improving your other innovations.
Steve Jobs Entrepreneur

) } export default BlockquoteStyling
